Articles.Content: Hey there, so I opted into the 1.2 beta, played around a bit, then I deleted my steam folder and redownloaded KSP 1.1.3, and now it refuses to go fullscreen on my main monitor. I have no Idea how to fix it and it is making it unplayable, any help would be fantastic!
Have the same Problem, still found no fix. Would like to hear if you find one.

Hi @Praetorian.

Can you try starting KSP with this command line argument, copy it into the Steam "set launch options" box.

 -adapter 0

@sal_vager

I put it as a launch option and it did nothing.
I have the exact same problem as well. Same exact situation, messed around with 1.2 and went back to current release. It is unplayable for me as well.

11 hours ago, Chainsaw said:

I have the exact same problem as well. Same exact situation, messed around with 1.2 and went back to current release. It is unplayable for me as well.

Yea it is beyond frustrating. I must say I am surprised that not more developers have tried to solve this issue, as there seems to be quite a lot of us who are experiencing the same thing. The symptoms are all the same, we had 1.1.3 installed, opted in for 1.2, played 1.2, went back to 1.1.3 and now the game that we paid for is close to unplayable.

@Praetorian, to fix this on Windows you will need to open the Windows registry and delete the Kerbal Space Program folder from HKEY_CURRENT_USER/Software/Squad/

Back up the registry first just in case.
